item.description:
We've reserved the conference room!  Weeks ahead of time, and paid for! (Thanks, Robyn!)  Hope to see you all there.

Let's discuss the top news of the week, including the current contraceptives debate and the nuances of the religious freedom vs. the libertarian values arguments, which are seemingly on the same side.  The Santorum surge is making headlines, and we can spend some time discussing what we're all giving up for Lent.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the conference room in the back.
item.name: Sunday Morning Discussion Group
